item.description:
Join us at Foxwoods Resort & Casino...

Take a chance at having a day of fun - with good food, good friends, good locale. (…We’re betting you’ll enjoy it!)

When: Sunday, March 25, 2012 Order of events:

7:30 AM meet outside the Bingo Hall (for those who will be playing) to reserve places in the non-smoking room

8:30 AM meet at Seasons Buffet for Breakfast

10:30 AM Bingo begins or For those not interested in Bingo, check out the rest of the casino or the spa. Spa services may require reservations at http://www.foxwoods.com/Spa.aspx Or check the entertainment listings for the day at http://www.foxwoods.com/Entertainment.aspx

Cost: Bingo $20 per person Breakfast $10-ish per person Spa and entertainment prices vary.  It's MYSTERY ENVELOPE day - so $20 admission gets you bingo cards, and a surprise inside the envelope - many times it's credits and a coupon for half of your breakfast buffet cost!

Gotta get there early if you want to sit in the non-smoking room.  Doors open at 8.

Must be 18 to play.
item.name: Breakfast Brunch and Bingo
